description: For the most succulent roast turkey this Christmas with a delicious fennel, sage, pistachio and cranberry turkey stuffing, simply follow this recipe.
keywords: Roast Turkey Stuffed With Pistachios And Cranberries
name: Roast Turkey Stuffed With Pistachios And Cranberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make gravy, place pan juices in a saucepan over medium heat. Sprinkle over flour, stirring with a wooden spoon until smooth. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbling. Remove pan from heat and gradually add stock, stirring constantly. Return pan to medium heat and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until gravy thickens. Serve gravy with roast turkey.

Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until gravy thickens. Serve gravy with roast turkey.
